r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.7M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Thinkpoint. The average
  contract duration was 0.77 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $189.5K. The longest
  contract was 2.21 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.1M.
lookup_name: 'THINKPOINT'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.7M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '27'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '8'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '30%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '97%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.12'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '1.6M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.77'
s421_mean_contract_value: '189.5K'
s425_max_duration: '2.21'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.1M'
